title: Why does Yorick have a superior version of Jarvans ult?

replies.body: yeah because yorick's W is instant, deals AOE physical damage, and isn't destructible.
Why do your posts ALWAYS suck?
Because it is a greatly inferior version, as a normal ability.
It can be cast at long range without putting himself in danger, doesnt block his own allies, and has relatively no cooldown?
It can also be destroyed. Stop making these worthless X champion is OP everytime a new champion comes out. You did the same with Kled.

And he seemed to shut up after a while.  I was hoping he just stopped coming.

Sadly my optimism is always in the wrong thing.
they are the same like apples and pork chop.

Why does Diana have Ori's ult on a basic ability?
Why does Corki have have Rumble ult on a basic ability?
Why does Rek'Sai have Cho'gath's ult on a basic ability?

I think I've made my point by now, stupid comparisons are stupid.

if jarvan builds a shred of AD he will facefk you

yorick wall does no dmg

OP is unranked with basically no games played and really funny stats.
Apparently OP spends more time playing boards than playing league.
